articles.description: Whether you're giving friends and family an ETA or keeping them apprised of where you are for security reasons, Google Maps makes it easy to share your exact location for a short time or continuously.
articles.content: Do you need to share your real-time location with someone? iPhone users have the Find My app, which allows them to share their location with their contacts. However, if you have an Android device, or… [+3278 chars]

articles.author: Mitchell Clark
articles.title: How to protect your email from spam and data collectors - The Verge
articles.description: With so many sites and apps asking for your email, it can feel like you’re giving up some privacy every time you sign up for a site. But thanks to email aliases and forwarding services, that doesn’t have to be the case.
articles.content: Nowadays, it seems like everyone on the web wants your email. When you give your email address to a site in order to log in or just get some info, many companies will take that as a free pass to do a… [+14565 chars]
